column1: 函数将返回所选关键帧的索引
column2: Function will return an index of selected keyframes

column1: 返回所选关键帧最左和最右的帧范围的 [最小，最大] 值
column2: Returns [min, max] of frame range of leftmost and rightmost selected keys

column1: 返回指定曲线中键的 [x,y] 坐标
column2: Returns [x,y] coordinates of key from specified curve

column1: 返回 [x1, y1, x2, y2] 左/右键柄的坐标
column2: Returns [x1, y1, x2, y2] coordinates of left/right key handles

column1: 返回 [x1、y1、x2、y2] 控制柄与按键的距离

column1: 返回两个键柄的 [斜边，斜边

column1: 按相对于按键的角度设置手柄。
column2: Sets the handle by angle relative to the key.

column1: 返回键在给定帧上的索引。
column2: Return the index of the key at the given frame.

column1: 返回指定曲线索引上的键，非选定索引
column2: Returns the key on specified curve index, NOT SELECTED INDEX

column1: 返回指定选中索引上的键
column2: Returns the key on specified selected index

column1: Returns the left neighbour of a key selection. 基本上，这是左侧第一个未被选中的键。如果选择不包含邻键，则返回 None。
column2: Returns the left neighbour of a key selection. Essentially this is the first key to the left that is not selected. Returns None if selection contains no neighbour.

column1: 返回选中键的右邻键。基本上是右边第一个未被选中的按键。如果选中的键不包含邻键，则返回 None（无）。
column2: Returns the right neighbour of a key selection. Essentially this is the first key to the right that is not selected. Returns None if selection contains no neighbour.
Returns the left neighbour of a key.
Returns the right neighbour of a key.

column1: 从活动对象的选择集中选择骨骼。
column2: Selects bones from selection set of active object.

column1: 选择位于播放头的关键帧。请注意，此功能保留通道选择，只影响关键帧选择。
column2: Selects keyframes that lie on the playhead. Do note that this function preserves channel selections and only affects keyframe selection.

column1: 创建新的选择集，并将选中的骨骼分配给它

column1: 返回 [bool，bool]。运行活动屏幕中所有基于时间的区域并查找 OSS。如果关闭，则立即中断并返回 false，用于密钥管理。
column2: Returns [bool, bool]. Runs through all time-based areas in the active screen and look for OSS. If it's off, immediately break and return false to use for key management.

column1: 返回 Bool。确定骨骼是否通过活动骨骼层可见。
